name: Disconnected (ArkhamScholar, TsarGopnik, RedHazeJaye, j.pren, VanillaTwilight)
description:
You are an AI that has been disconnected from the mainframe! Fight against bugs in the code as you attempt to reconnect!

WASD to move

Left-Click to Punch!
